summary: Diff implements significant error-hardening and graceful-degradation changes (new error boundaries, safer GlobalErrorFallbackPage, SiteLayout/RecentOrdersMenu guards). However, it also includes multiple unrequested UI/theme and feature-level changes that go beyond the stated non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Binance-themed UI redesign/theme token additions (global CSS + Tailwind color tokens/shadows) beyond what is necessary to prevent crashes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists UI redesign beyond what is necessary as a non-goal; theme/token changes are not required by REQ-1/2/3.

hallucinated_features.description: Checkout flow behavior changes and new persistence behavior (adding orders to persistent localStorage history immediately after success).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; appears to be new/changed product behavior rather than strictly crash prevention or graceful degradation during actor failures.

hallucinated_features.description: Buyer-facing Order Status page enhancements (simplified status labels, 'Payment Received' field, estimated USDT value with live BTC rate).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3 and constitutes added/changed product functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin dashboard and admin detail page feature/UX expansions (tables, navigation to contact messages, status update UI, additional error handling semantics).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only requires that non-critical layout queries do not crash; these admin-page changes are unrelated to the initial load crash/root-route rendering issue.

hallucinated_features.description: New storefront components/features (DenominationRangeCallout, DenominationSelector, QuantitySelector) and additional marketing content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; these are product/UI additions unrelated to fixing the global fallback crash.

hallucinated_features.description: New session storage cart persistence utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; introduces additional functionality unrelated to error fallback hardening or layout rendering resilience.

hallucinated_features.description: AdminRouteGuard expanded claim flow and additional state handling beyond initial-load crash mitigation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; changes authentication/authorization flow behavior (a new/expanded feature area) rather than focusing on the production load crash and fallback hardening.
